Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of Vice President Joe Biden by stating that he was "groping" Stephanie Carter, when in reality, he had his hands on her shoulders.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Vice President Biden was engaging in inappropriate behavior.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the manipulated image accurately represents the actions of Vice President Biden, when in fact it has been proven to be manipulated and not a true representation of the event.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for Vice President Biden's actions, as Stephanie Carter herself stated that she was not offended by his actions and that they were friends.
